characters.name: angry-face

action.value: stun
poison

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%

Marked for the Hunt: At the beginning of each round in which you long rest, you may choose one ally to gain the benefits of any of your active Dooms as if the Dooms were in that ally's active area for the round

masteries: Never perform a Doom action that you have already performed in the scenario
Kill three Doomed enemies during one of your turn

characters.name: brute

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItemFh%
Rested and Ready: Whenever you long rest, add +1 %game.action.move% to your first move ability the following round

masteries: Cause enemies to suffer a total of 12 or more Retaliate damage during attacks targeting you in a single round
Accross three consecutive rounds, play six different ability cards and cause enemies to suffer at least %game.damage:6% on each of your turns

characters.name: circles

action.value: poison
earth
curse

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Phase Out: Once each scenario during ordering of initiative, after all ability cards haven been revealed, all your summons gain %game.condition.invisible%

masteries: Summon the Lava Golem on your first turn and keep it alive for the entire scenario
Perform the summon action of five different ability cards

characters.name: cragheart

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItemFh%
%game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Earthquakes Whenever a new room is revealed, control all enemies in the newly revealed room: %game.action.move% 1, this movement must end in an empty hex

masteries: Only attack enemies adjacent to obstacles or walls
Damage or heal at least one ally each round

characters.name: demolitionist

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Remodeling Whenever you rest while adjacent to a wall or obstacle, you may place an obstalce in an empty hex within %game.action.range% 2 (of you)

masteries: Deal 10 or more damage with each of three different attack actions
Destroy at least six obstacles. End the scenario with no obstacles on the map other than ones placed by allies

characters.name: diviner

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Tip the Scales Whenever you rest, you may look at the top card of one attack modifier deck, then you may %game.elementHalf.consume:dark|light% to place one card on the bottom of the deck

masteries: During one round, have at least four monsters move into four different Rifts that affect those monsters
Reveal at least one card from at least one ability card deck or attack modifier deck each round

characters.name: eclipse

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%

Empowering Night At the start of the scenario, you may discard two cards to add a card with an action containing a persistent symbol from your pool to your hand and immediately play it, performing that action

masteries: Have %game.condition.invisible% at the start or end of each of your turns
%game.element.dark% or %game.element.consume.dark% during each of your turns

characters.name: envx

action.value: All adjacent allies may perform "%game.action.move%1" at end of turn.
All adjacent allies and enemies suffer %game.damage:2% ad end of turn.
X is the number of adjacent figures.
All adjacent enemies deduct -1 %game.action.attack% from all their attacks.
All adjacent summoned allies add +1 %game.action.attack% to all their attacks
Add +2 %game.action.attack% when the target is adjacent to any of your allies
Add %game.condition.disarm% when the target is affected by a negative condition.

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItem%
%game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeScenario%
Spinning Up: At the start of your first turn each scenario, you may play one card from your hand to perform a persistent loss action of that card.

masteries: Perform two different summon actions on your first turn and keep all summons from those actions alive for the entire scenario.
Perform three different non-summon persistent loss actions before your first rest.

characters.name: hatchet

perks.custom: Hasty Pick-up: Once each scenario, during your turn, if the Favourite is in a hex on the map, you may %game.element.consume.air% to return it to it's ability card

masteries: %game.element.air% or %game.element.consume.air% during each of your turns
During each round in which there is at least one enemy on the map at the start of your turn, either place one of your tokens on an ability card of yours or on an enemy

characters.name: lightning

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItemFh%
Rapid Recovery: Whenever you heal from a long rest, add +1 %game.action.heal%

masteries: Lose at least one hit point during each of your turns, without ever performing the bottom action of Blood Pact
Have exactly one hit point at the end of each of your turns

characters.name: mindthief

action.value: poison
X is half the rat's current hit point value (rounded up).

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Lying Low: You are considered to be last in initiative order when determining monster focus

masteries: Trigger the on-attack effect of four different Augments thrice each
Never be targeted by an attack

characters.name: music-note

perks.custom: Storyteller: At the end of each scenario, each character in that scenario gains 8 experience if you successfully completed your battle goal

masteries: On your first turn of the scenario and the turn after each of your rests, perform one Song action that you have not yet performed this scenario
Havel all 10 monster %game.condition.curse% cards and all 10 %game.condition.bless% cards in modifier decks at the same time

characters.name: red-guard

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItemFh%
Brilliant Aegis: Whenever you are attacked, you may %game.element.consume.light% to gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack and have the attacker gain disadvantage for the attack

masteries: Kill at least five enemies during their turns
Force each enemy in the scenario to move at least one hex, forcing at least six enemies to move

characters.name: saw

perks.custom: Revitalizing Medicine: Whenever an ally performs the Heal ability of Medical Pack or Large Medical Pack, that character may first remove one negative condition

masteries: On each of your turns, give an ally an ability card, target an ally with a heal ability, grant an ally shield, or place an ability card in an ally's active area
Deal at least %game.damage:20% with a single attack ability

characters.name: scoundrel

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Cloak of Invisibility: Once each scenario, during your turn, perform "%game.condition.invisible%, self"

masteries: Kill at least six enemies that are adjacent to at least on of your allies
Kill at least six enemies that are adjacent to none of your allies

characters.name: spellweaver

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Etheric Bound: Whenever you short rest, if Reviving Ether is in your discard pile, first return it to your hand

masteries: Infuse and consume all six elements
Perform four different loss actions twice each

characters.name: squidface

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%

Xorn's Boon: Once each scenario, during your turn, cause each enemy that has %game.condition.poison% to duffer %game.damage:1% and gain %game.condition.muddle% and each ally who has %game.condition.poison% to suffer %game.damage:1% to gain %game.condition.strengthen%

masteries: Kill at least five enemies with non-attack abilities
Perform three different attack abilities that target at least four enemies each

characters.name: sun

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItemFh%
%game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Shielding Light: Whenever one of your heals would cause an ally's current hit point value to increase beyond their maximum hit point value, that ally gains %game.condition.ward%

masteries: Reduce attacks targeting you by a total of 20 or more through Shield effects in a single round
%game.element.light% or %game.element.consume.light% during each of your turns

characters.name: three-spears

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItemFh%
Well Supplied: Once each scenario, during your turn, if you have a persistend Quartermaster ability card in your active area, you may recover up to four cards from your discard pile

masteries: Spend, lose, or refresh one or more items on each of your turns without ever performing the top action of Reinforced Steel
Loot six or more loot tokens in a single turn

characters.name: tinkerer

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Rejuvenating Vapor: Whenever you long rest, you may perform "%game.action.heal%, %game.action.range% 3"

masteries: Heal an ally or apply a negative condition to an enemy each turn
Perform two actions with lost icons before your first rest and then only rest after having played at least two actions with lost icons since your previous rest

characters.name: triangles

action.value: You may perform Attack actions as if you occupy the summon's hex.
wild

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Elemental Proficiency: At the start of each scenario and whenever you long rest, %game.element.wild%

masteries: Consume at least two different elements with each of four different attack abilities without ever performing the bottom action of Formless Power of Shaping in Ether
Infuse five or more elements during one of your turns, then consume five or more elements during your following turn

characters.name: two-mini

action.value: poison
immobilize
adjacentEnemies
All adjacent allies add +2 %game.action.attack% to all their attacks.

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%

Bear Treat: During each round in which you long rest, at initiative 99, you may skip the bear's normal turn to Command: "%game.action.move%3; %game.action.loot%1; If the loot ability was performed: %gamae.action.heal%3, self"

masteries: Have your bear summon deal 10 or more damage in three consecutive rounds
You or your summons must apply a negative condition to at least 10 different enemies

characters.name: voidwarden

perks.custom: %game.custom.perks.ignoreScenario%
Grave Defense: Whenever you rest, you may %game.elementHalf.consume:ice|dark% to give %game.condition.ward% to one ally who has %game.condition.poison%

masteries: Cause enemies to suffer 20 or more damage in a single turn with granted or commanded attacks
Give at least one ally or enemy %game.condition.poison%, %game.condition.strengthen%, %game.condition.bless%, or %game.condition.ward% each round
